title: The conveyance of the land under rehab component shall be done in favor of the Slum Dwellers Co Operative Society
clause_text: The conveyance of the land under rehab component shall be done in favor of the Slum Dwellers Co Operative Society.
section: SANCTION TO THE SRS The following procedure shall be adopted while examining and sanctioning any S.R.S. in accordance with the provisions of the said Regulations,
